actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude from gross income certain interest amounts received by individuals.
short_title: Simple Savings Tax Relief Act of 2007

summary.text: Simple Savings Tax Relief Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income up to $400 (twice such amount on a joint return) of interest income annually. Provides for an inflation adjustment to such exclusion amount beginning after 2008.

titles.title: Simple Savings Tax Relief Act of 2007
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude from gross income certain interest amounts received by individuals.
